resources.string: No devices have been found yet. Every time a device is discovered, a location on the map will be shown, where this happened. This does not mean that someone tracked you on every location. In most cases you will find devices from others in public transport or from one of your neighbors.
Warns you about a possible tracking device
Support the project by sharing some anonymized data

Whenever the app detects an AirTag or another Find My device, they will be listed here. The list will likely contain devices that did not track you. For devices that track you, you will receive a notification.

Whenever you receive a notification for being tracked by a know device (e.g. an AirTag you own) you can ignore them. Those ignored devices will appear here. Remember: An AirTag changes their Bluetooth address once a day. So a known AirTag becomes a new one after a day.
If enabled more detailed tracking information can be provided when being tracked!
By granting this permission more detailed tracking information can be provided when being tracked. This is an optional feature!
Mark this notification as false alarm
Where was the FindMy device hidden?
You need to give this permission in order to use this App!

This app has been developed by researchers of the Technical University of Darmstadt, Germany. With our study we want to find out how many people are affected by malicious tracking attempts. Whether Apple's Find My devices are actually used for tracking people. And ultimately, how well we can protect people from this through our app. 
 To join you need to 18 years or older! 


• We will collect some information about the discovered devices like the device type, rssi value (signal strength) and the date and time of the discovery 

 • How many notifications have been sent to you, the date and time of the alert as well as the feedback which you can provide optionally


We will NOT share any location data or data which might let identify you! The participation is completely anonymous!
This App will notify you when it seems like an AirTag or FindMy capable device is tracking you!

This app needs location permission to allow Bluetooth scanning for AirTags or other Find My devices even when the app is closed or not in use. Additionally, you can optionally allow the app to log the location when you have been tracked.
In order to prevent the App from being killed in the Background we need to disable battery optimization!

To get a more detailed location history in case you\'re being tracked, allow this app to use your location all the time. This lets us save the location of an AirTag or FindMy Device even when the App is closed. This feature is optional and no location data will leave your device.
If enabled bluetooth low power scan will be used to discover nearby AirTags!WARNING: This could cause that some devices won\'t be discovered!
This device is not able to play a sound!
Scan this AirTag with your phone via NFC to get more Information!
Show a list of all used third party libraries and their licenses
View our short and simple privacy policy
You have to decide whether you want to share some anonymized data or not!
Open the notification to get more info. A device has followed you for at least 30 minutes.
This permission is needed to provide some more detailed tracking information in case an AirTag or FindMy device is tracking you. This permission is optional!
This app needs permission to access your location to search for surrounding AirTags via Bluetooth Low Energy. You must grant this permission to use the app!
